data.text: Kempinski Hotel Bodrum is renowned for its exceptional service and luxurious accommodations. The staff goes above and beyond to ensure that guests have an unforgettable experience, exceeding their expectations. The property itself is stunning, with breathtaking views that further enhance the overall beauty of the hotel. It truly is a remarkable destination that offers a perfect blend of elegance and natural surroundings.
data.title: Amazing property great staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Kempinski Hotel Bodrum. We are thrilled to hear that our commitment to exceptional service and luxurious accommodations has significantly contributed to making your stay unforgettable.

Our team takes great pride in going above and beyond for our guests, and it is always rewarding to receive such positive feedback about their efforts. We are delighted that you appreciated the breathtaking views and the stunning beauty of our property, which we believe plays a crucial role in creating the perfect blend of elegance and harmony with nature.

Your kind words are a source of motivation for us to continue delivering the remarkable experiences Kempinski is known for. 

It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to our hotel in the nearest future, 

Best regards,
Serkan Husunbeyi
General Manager
owner_response.author: Serkan  Husunbeyi

data.text: The place which you can feel like your home.When I want to excape from City for good work that is the place which you can find everything.Feel comfortable and relax.Good food , services , cleaning with smily and friendly , profesional staff from start to end.Thanks for everything.
data.title: Feel home with best servise üëç

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are thrilled to hear that our beautiful hotel  provided you with a home-like atmosphere, offering the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of the city. It's delightful to know that you found everything you needed to feel comfortable and relaxed during your stay with us.

We take great pride in providing excellent food, services, and cleanliness, and we are pleased that our efforts were reflected in your experience. Our dedicated staff strives to maintain a professional yet friendly demeanor from the moment you arrive until your departure.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again in the nearest future.

Best regards,
Serkan Husunbeyi
General Manager
owner_response.author: Serkan  Husunbeyi

data.text:
We spent 4 nights at the hotel at the very beginning of February.
Unfortunately, the hotel was almost empty, only a few rooms were booked, but we recommend everyone to travel there even in this quieter period, it is a perfect place to relax from the fatigue of the end of the year and recharge before the bigger spring and summer jobs.
The entire staff (from the front desk to the restaurant and housekeeping) provided perfect service, they paid attention to everything, and they were kind and polite.
I would like to say special thanks to Ceyda and Yusuf for their help and service in the morning at the restaurant.
We would like to thank Betul and, above all, Alexandra, who brightened our evenings with perfect service, kindness, and attention.
data.title: I wish to come back

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest;

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us following your recent stay at our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay  with us at the beginning of February.

Your kind words about our staff, from the front desk to the restaurant and housekeeping, mean a lot to us. Providing exceptional service and creating memorable experiences for our guests is our top priority, and we are thrilled to hear that our team members made your stay special.

We will be sure to pass along your special thanks to our staff and they will be delighted to know that they contributed to making your stay enjoyable and memorable.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future for another relaxing getaway.

Best regards,
Serkan H√ºs√ºnbeyi
General Manager
owner_response.author: Serkan  Husunbeyi

data.text: We will not be staying at a Kempinski Hotel again as a shirt was taken from the room on the day after we arrived.  The shirt was left out before we went for breakfast with the intention to have it washed the following day.  When we returned  in the afternoon the shirt had disappeared.  We reported the incident to the front desk and various managers in the hotel to no avail.  I even sent emails to the chief executive of the Kempinski Hotels Herr Bernold O. Schroeder and did not receive the courtesy of a response. This experience spoiled our stay at the hotel.
data.title: Theft from the room

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest;
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your recent stay  with us.
We understand the frustration caused by the disappearance of your shirt, and we truly regret any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please be assured that upon receiving your report, our Front Office team, along with other relevant departments, thoroughly investigated the matter under the leadership of our management team. However, despite our extensive efforts, it appears that the shirt in question did not turn up within our premises.
We want to assure you that the security and well-being of our guests are of paramount importance to us. We continuously strive to maintain the highest standards of service and hospitality, and incidents such as these are taken very seriously.
Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience caused and the impact it had on your overall experience with us. 
Thank you for your understanding and for bringing this matter to our attention.
Best regards,
Serkan H√ºs√ºnbeyi
General Manager
owner_response.author: Serkan  Husunbeyi

data.text: OMG! What a terrible hotel. It‚Äôs supposed to be 5* luxury and I would compare it to a low quality 4*. Steps are unsafe and balcony is loose. Place is dirty. Drinks and food are ridiculously overpriced at 21euro for a standard cocktail. Staff are nice and trying to stay positive in a hotel that‚Äôs needs closing down and refurbishing. Kempinski should be ashamed of themselves for operating this hotel and they have lost a customer forever. I expect to receive a placating reply on trip advisor from the manager who didn‚Äôt meet even with us last night to discuss our concerns.
data.title: TERRIBLE HOTEL

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest;

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We want to assure you that  we uphold the highest standards expected of a 5-star establishment, including all Kempinski standards. Our safety regulations are rigorously enforced, and our staff is dedicated to providing quality service in all areas.

Your satisfaction is important to us, and we appreciate your valuable feedback. We will be providing exceptional and high quality services as we always do for all our guests.

Best regards,
Ferman Dogan
General Manager
owner_response.author: Ferman Dogan
